function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Social activities such as mingas can lead to postponement of work and affect the rhythm of community life","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity to amacayacu national park and rich biodiversity may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain long-term toll of coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on workforce and economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural differences in work environment expectations","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interactions between children aged 5 to 18 and the local population can lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in hr organization in the ’new normal’ can lead to challenges in implementing health and safety protocols for employees and visitors.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation practices in hospitality training could lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and close contact during role-playing activities could facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exchange of ideas and practices between locals and foreign visitors could introduce new pathogens to the community.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging waste collection through incentives may lead to increased human contact with waste, increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Illegal wildlife trade and captivity practices in the amazon may contribute to the spread of zoonotic diseases and threaten public health.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Former hunters, now working as wildlife keepers, may still pose a risk of disease transmission due to their previous hunting activities and close contact with wildlife.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of non-organic waste to indigenous communities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ecotourism bringing people from different parts of the world to indigenous communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in the community","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and connection to nature leading to unsustainable lifestyle.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on potential over credentials in hiring process could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases in the workplace if health status is not properly assessed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on sustainable development and conservation in partnerships may lead to increased risk of exposure to zoonotic diseases or environmental hazards.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human health and well-being in favor of economic recovery may lead to increased risk of public health crises, including contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community spirit.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on communal support for renovation work may pose health risks during contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of program focused on traditional medicines with local shaman","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Waste management program generating revenues from plastic waste","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification of revenue streams including f&b, spa treatments, and transports","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bringing sanitary and bedding materials from the capital may introduce contagious diseases from outside the local area.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on revenue from hotel nights can be risky, especially in the context of a pandemic such as covid-19.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Joint activities with local communities may increase the risk of disease transmission due to close contact and shared risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on traditional medicine for virus protection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to clean water and risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disconnecting from over-connected life may impact awareness of health and safety measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased
